items.content_html: The Vanilla Calendar Pro is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker component with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript frameworks and libraries. It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.

It is designed to be lightweight, easy to use, and feature-rich, without relying on external dependencies.
